BPA-free

Working time: 6-8 hours
Product size: 93x157mm
Usage area: 20-40 m²

entry.title: Ohm Organic Neem Oil (for skin, hair, garden AND home!)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Natural Wholesalers
Type: Oils
Price: 50.00

Ohm Oil's Neem Oil (50ml) is an age-old popular ingredient used in skin care, hair care, in gardens, and home products.
  • Antibacterial, antimicrobial, biopesticide, insecticide, insect repellent and fungicide for skin, scalp, gardens and home
  • Effective and popular non-toxic lice treatment
  • A natural alternative to chemical flea and mites control (for dogs only)
  • Effective garden and home pest control - biodegradable and non-toxic to wildlife, mammals, birds, earthworms, or beneficial insects such as butterflies, bees and ladybirds - will not pollute ground water
  • Powerful antioxidant, moisturiser and revitaliser
  • Healing for acne-prone skin types and problematic skin (redness, itchiness and irritations like eczema and various dermatitis)
  • Good for dry skin and dandruff
  • Redcues pigmentation and scars
  • Protects skin against infections, boils and ulcers
  • Locally produced to reduce your carbon footprint!

Ingredients

Pure organic Neem Oil

How to use

Can be used directly on hair and skin, or you can add it to your cosmetic products. Perfect to mix into sprays to be used in the garden and home.

Neem Oil is often diluted with other carrier oils, but for head lice treatments, it's best to use on its own. Massage into scalp and comb through the hair with a fine tooth comb, removing any lice or nits in this process. Wrap the hair in plastic or a shower cap and leave on for an hour or longer. Remove the Neem Oil with shampoo. Repeat this procedure 2-3 times per week until the nits and lice are no longer present.

entry.title: OHM Eucalyptus Essential Oil: Therapeutic Grade (10 ml)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Natural Wholesalers
Type: Aromatherapy
Price: 23.00

This 100% pure 10ml essential Eucalyptus Oil by OHM Oils (Eucalyptus Smithii) really helps to clear the chest and can be used in an oil burner or diffuser, as a steam inhalation, in the bath or diluted as a massage oil

  • Helps to clear nasal congestion and open up the chest
  • Often used to support the respiratory system and clear sinusitis
  • Very useful in massage oils or steam baths to help colds & 'flu
  • Eucalyptus has anti-viral properties and can protect against viral infections of the respiratory tract
  • Proudly made in South Africa

HOW TO USE

Eucalyptus Oil may be used diluted or directly on the skin as needed

1. Use a few drops in an oil burner or diffuser to fill the air with the healing benefits
2. Add 3 - 5 drops to your bath or as a steam inhalation

3. Add 3 - 5 drops to 10 ml massage oil and use a a chest and back rub

Please note: Essential Oils should not be taken internally. Not recommended during pregnancy. 

OHM Oils is a range of pure essential oils and essential oil blends that is true to the principle of ESSENCE. They believe that an essential oil is a gift of the essence or the spirit of the plant, providing healing and upliftment to those that use it.

entry.title: Ohm Natural Lice Treatment
entry.summary:
Vendor: Natural Wholesalers
Type: Oils
Price: 50.00

Ohm Oil's Natural Lice Treatment (50ml) is non-toxic, containing Tea Tree Oil and Neem Oil.

  • Effective and popular non-toxic lice treatment
  • Both Tea Tree Oil and Neem Oil are effective in lice control and also contain compounds that disrupt the life cycle of the louse
  • Powerful antioxidant, moisturiser and revitaliser for scalp and hair
  • Also good for dry skin and dandruff
  • Locally produced to reduce your carbon footprint!

Ingredients

Organic Grape Seed Oil, Neem Oil and Tea Tree Oil.

How to use

Massage onto scalp and hair and comb through with a fine tooth nit comb. Leave on for approximately 20 - 30 minutes before washing hair. (We recommend washing with Treemendous Tea Tree Shampoo after treatment). Depending on the severity of louse infestation, you may have to repeat treatment in a few days. 

Caution: Not recommended for use during pregnancy

Note: Make sure that all bedding is changed and that the living and sleeping areas are thoroughly cleaned and vacuumed. All members of the family should be treated to prevent re-infestation.

Ohm Oil's Organic Moroccan Argan Oil (50ml) is known as "liquid gold" due to its powerful anti-ageing and beautifying properties!

  • Derived from the kernels of the fruit of the argan tree
  • A rich source of vitamin E which is beneficial for healthy skin, hair and eyes, and to reduce the damaging effects of free radicals
  • Treats inflammatory skin conditions such as eczema, psoriasis, rosacea and more
  • Increases skin elasticity and hydration and slows down signs of ageing
  • Heals wounds, minor burns, rashes, irritations and damaged skin tissue
  • Prevents and reduces stretch marks
  • Argan oil’s antioxidant and anti-inflammatory compounds may help reduce redness and irritation of the skin caused by acne
  • Argan is known to revitalise and nourish scalp and hair: aids dryness and itching, combats split ends
  • Keeps nails strong and healthy, and repairs and hydrates cuticles
  • May slow the growth and reproduction of certain cancer cells

Ingredients

Pure organic Moroccan Argan Oil

How to use

  • For hair: Apply the oil to clean hair by rubbing in for 2-3 minutes to allow the product to spread evenly and penetrate the hair follicle. Make sure you spread the oil from root to tip, combing through if necessary
  • For skin: Apply the oil to clean skin and slowly massage in circular motions
  • Nails: Apply to cuticles and nails and gently massage in

entry.title: OHM Pure Essential Cedarwood Oil: Therapeutic Grade
entry.summary:
Vendor: Natural Wholesalers
Type: Aromatherapy
Price: 32.00

Ohm Oil's Pure Cedarwood Essential Oil (10ml) emits a warm, woody scent and has wonderful calming properties. It's a popular oil for both its glorious aromatic uses as well as topical uses!
  • Adding a few drops to a diffuser or oil burner creates a relaxing environment with its grounding aroma that promotes feelings of wellness and emotional balance (same effects produced by using cedarwood essential oil in a massage)
  • Cedarwood contains sedative properties - a wonderful complimentary treatment for those who suffer from anxiety, tension or insomnia
  • Calming and grounding for the mind AND body
  • For those who suffer from nightmares or night terrors, apply a drop or 2 of Cedarwood essential oil to the bottom of your feet
  • Cedarwood works magic for skin imperfections and oily skin types - a must have for those who suffer from acne (just one drop on affected area does the trick!)
  • Non-toxic and eco-friendly insect repellent (add to diffuser, use in oil burner or apply directly to your skin)
  • Can be added to topsoil or mulch to keep garden pests at bay
  • Support local! Proudly made in South Africa

Ingredients

100% Pure Cedarwood Essential Oil

How to use

Cedarwood Essential Oil may be used in a number of ways:

1. Use a few drops in an oil burner or diffuser to fill the air with the healing benefits
2. Add 3 - 5 drops to your bath
3. Add 3 - 5 drops to 10 ml massage oil

Please note: Essential Oils should not be taken internally. Not recommended during pregnancy.

entry.title: OHM Pure Essential Wintergreen Oil: Therapeutic Grade

Ohm's Wintergreen Essential Oil (10ml) had a sweet, minty and refreshing, and was used by Native Americans for reducing fever, inflammation, pain, and improving respiratory functioning.

  • Although it comes with a crisp aroma, it produces both soothing and warming properties to both the body and mind
  • Effective painkiller, anti-inflammatory and numbing agent - great for relaxing massages, post-workout rubs and applying to painful joints
  • Add to a warm bath to soothe the body and mind   
  • Has a strong and pleasant odour which will help mask unpleasant smells - great to use in a mist diffuser or oil burner, or add a few drops to smelly shoes
  • Apply Wintergreen essential oil to your skin to help reduce the appearance of blemishes  - always dilute when using it
  • Support local! Proudly made in South Africa

    Ingredients

    100% pure wintergreen essential oil

    How to use

    Wintergreen Essential Oil may be used in a number of ways:

    1. Use a few drops in an oil burner or diffuser to fill the air with the healing benefits
    2. Add 3 - 5 drops to your bath
    3. Add 3 - 5 drops to 10 ml massage oil

    Please note: Essential Oils should not be taken internally. Not recommended during pregnancy.
